channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Police across Canada warn parents after morphine, staples, needles found in candy
item.description: Police in Ontario and Saskatchewan are warning parents to check Halloween candy after reports of tampered treats, including a suspected opioid in Mattawa and metal in Regina.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Canada, Philippines sign defence pact to deter aggression from China
item.description: There was no immediate comment from China, which has accused the Philippines of being a “troublemaker” and a “saboteur of regional stability."

item.title: Q&A: Director Alireza Khatami on making Canada’s Oscar submission, The Things You Kill
item.description: “I showed the depth of my darkness, hoping people would look at their own.”

item.title: ‘Heartache': Toronto Blue Jays fans feel weight of World Series loss
item.description: The Toronto Blue Jays lost the World Series to the Los Angeles Dodgers in extra innings in Game 7. Many fans said they're shocked at the result, but hopeful for the future.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Chris Tanev hospitalized after collision in Maple Leafs' win
item.description: Maple Leafs defenceman Chris Tanev was taken to hospital after a collision in Toronto’s 5-2 win over Philadelphia but had movement in all extremities, coach Craig Berube said.

item.title: Driver dead, kids injured after school bus crash on Highway 401 near London, Ont.
item.description: A school bus driver has died and four children have been taken to hospital with minor injuries following a school bus crash off the westbound lanes of Highway 401 near London, Ont., Ontario Provincial Police (OPP) announced Sunday.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Blue Jays infielder Ernie Clement sets MLB record with 30 hits in postseason
item.description: Ernie Clement set an MLB record with 30 postseason hits, breaking Randy Arozarena’s mark. He hit .417, extended his streak to 13 games, and nearly won Game 7 for Toronto.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Old dog, new tricks: Sask. man reunites with his food truck after a decade apart
item.description: A Saskatchewan man who had to sell his hot dog truck a decade ago is getting back in business, thanks to a photographer who happened upon the truck as he drove through the province.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Carney advised to push back on Trump in April call if provoked: memo
item.description: Federal officials prepared the internal memo to guide Carney's conversation with Trump following the Liberal party's April 28 election victory.

item.title: It's municipal election day in Quebec. Here's what you need to know
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Here's why sleep experts think we should abolish daylight saving time
item.description: While it usually only takes most Canadians a few days to adjust to the shift between daylight saving time and standard time, sleep experts say the constant time travel back and forth harms our sleep and has a negative affect on our body's internal clocks.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: With Día de Muertos, Mexican Quebecers keep traditions — and the dead — alive
item.description: During this multi-day commemoration, Mexicans and the diaspora reflect on life, death, and memories they shared with their late loved ones. Some Mexican Quebecers have channeled that grief to share their culture with wider audiences.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
